attributes.action: maintain Carers entitlement to Carers' allowance when annual earnings below DWP limits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carers often do part time work when they can and may not be able to influence when they are paid. If the salary goes above DWP limits for one week or month they lose the whole months benefit even if their pay for the year would still be below minimum wage. It's wrong. Why can't the DWP just average it for the whole year?
